title: LG TV Plus
summary: Simply browse and play your Smart TV with your smartphone!

descriptionHTML:
With the LG TV Plus app, control your smart TV, view photos, and play videos and music from your phone on the big TV screen!

Broaden your Smart TV experience with the LG TV Plus app.
The remote control function enables you to operate the LG webOS TV.
Easily browse your photos, videos, and music on your smartphone from the LG TV Plus app and enjoy them on the big screen.

[Notes]
This app supports only LG webOS Smart TV released on and after 2014.
The content-related feature is available from 2015 webOS Smart TV 2.0, in specific country.
If your LG Smart TV is not webOS Smart TV, please use “LG TV Remote” or “LG TV Remote 2011” app.
You can use LG TV Plus after pairing your TV and mobile device on the same Wi-Fi network.


[Supported Models]

'14 ~ ’18 webOS TV
"EC93xx", "EC97xx", "EC98xx", "EF95xx", "EF98xx", "EG91xx", "EG92xx", "EG95xx",

'17 webOS miniBeam
"HF80Jx", "HF85Jx", "HF65Fx", "HF60Hx", "HU80Kx", "PF1xxx", "PF50Kx"


[Required permissions]

1) Mandatory app permissions : Not required
2) Optional app permissions
- Storage : Access photos, videos, music content on your device to display on the TV.
- Calendar : Read calendar information on your device to display on the TV. (Available from 2016 webOS TV and above)

※ You can still use the service without giving the app optional permissions.
※ If you are using an Android version lower than 6.0, you may not be able to approve app permissions optionally. In the case, please contact the device manufacturer for update availability to Android 6.0 and above, and try again.
comments: Last update screw all good in the app, now necessary functions on different screens, swipe from one screen to another. But worst thing switching off from app - like on old Windows XP - Are you sure that you want to switch off TV?, you will lost connection. Every time you should confirm the same, yes, yes, yes I'm sure.... Developers-designers added more clicks, swipes, they don't like straight easy ways, hate app now!

Super annoyed. The upgrade doesn't seem to have simple features like direct sharing of a web link from phone to LG browser. The "Share Via" option seems to have disappeared. The new app may be more visually appealing but the user experience is far worse. The app has become very cumbersome.

Love the app on my phone. I do have a slight problem with it on my watch. Although we are now close to a point of your watch becoming a magic remote. The app doesn't look at the device screen size and cuts off the bottom causing the home and back buttons to become lost. Device is a polar m600 watch.

New update removed feature to share out off Chrome on Android. If you don't have the content downloaded directly on your phone you can no longer stream to TV. Was a 4 star app before. Extremely dissatisfied.

Since the latest update I am not able to share Mixcloud or SoundCloud streams to tv any more, and since this was 95% of what I used the smartphone app for, I am most unsatisfied now.  I really don't see why would someone use a smartphone to simply switch between live TV channels - for that, the remote control is already well designed.

some features are removed.  _ app icon removed from share menus for share from any app to tv.  _ can't access to all programs of antenna, cable and satellite same time. it was very useful for fast switching between programs from different live tv sources. now there isn't any access to other live tv sources (antenna, cable, satellite). or any method for change live tv source.  _ marked programs as favorite, not divide from other programs. it's not useful now.
